DOC.brief_summary: An open label study determine efficacy safety SPARC1507
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects advance Biliary tract carcinoma meeting eligibility criterion randomize study .
DOC.criteria: Evidence advanced/metastatic biliary tract cancer Male female ≥ 18 year old Participants must measurable disease accord RECIST ECOG performance status ≤ 1 Known hypersensitivity trial treatment , excipients Prior history treatment taxane therapy Cardiovascular disorder per Investigator 's discretion The subject receive radiation therapy
